MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G74 postcode area of East Kilbride, affecting properties in Highfield Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 2:02AM. Our engineers are on their way to the local substationto investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:15AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:30AM on 16 November 2020.
